tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE OrganicFarming (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    certification_status BOOLEAN,
    certification_agency TEXT,
    certification_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FarmFields (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255),
    field_area DECIMAL,
    crop_id INT,
    method_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES CropRotation(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES OrganicFarmingMethods(id)
);
